text: Cherie Ann Currie (born November 30, 1959) is an American musician, singer and actress. She was lead vocalist of The Runaways, a Los Angeles rock band from the 1970s. After that, she became a solo artist. Cherie Currie was born in Encino, California. title: Cherie Currie
